feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: E 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
